page.title: 11A FARM IN SIBSEY (cont'd)
page.content: When we asked{MR.J.J GRANT }some questions about his farm.Then we asked how many{tractors}he has. here is a graph to show which make of {tractors}he has. {************************************** {* JOHN DEERE} 3 {M.F} 16{ {************************************** {* CASE } 4{ INTERNATIONAL}2 {************************************** {* TRACK MARSHALL} 2 TOTAL {27 {************************************** {MR.J.J GRANT}works with his son.{MR. {GRANT}has been in his business 35 for years.The silt land is much better land than the clay land this is the order of rotation to stop disease. { {potatoes, wheat, beet, wheat, peas, {wheat, beet, wheat. }
